text: Nza wari wo Bakɨme Zisas Krais wo ŋkasŋka bakɨme phorgɨp taagi zirɨrgane bun nde suaŋgi. Nza mba Krais taagi zirɨrgane bun nde nzuav, nza fhura shɨshɨgap guma wo ndɨkndɨgar nzuai suambarar nde muuŋgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nza wari won rɨmgira Fhe Bakɨmen vhava ŋaar gum ana ŋkasŋka garim, ni anan kegap him, nza ni gangiap, nza ne bun nde nzuai. 1.16 Kha kameŋ, ne Zisas fhav harigi khesharigi. Ndu Matiu 17.1 kegɨp ganɨ ŋgɨp ves 13 thɨgɨri. Ndu vhɨra Mak 9.2 kegɨp ganɨ ŋgɨp ves 13 thɨgɨri. Ndu vhɨra Ruk 9.28 kegɨp ganɨ ŋgɨp ves 36 thɨgɨri.
